title: Principles of Sovereign Computing
content: Deterministic execution is a core principle. It ensures that a program, given the same input and initial state, will always produce the same output. This is crucial for verifiable and auditable systems.

title: Lightweight AI Models
content: Modern AI research focuses on creating smaller, more efficient models that can run on edge devices without specialized hardware like GPUs. This includes procedural and logic-based systems.

title: Rust Programming Language
content: Rust is a systems programming language focused on safety, concurrency, and performance. Its ownership model guarantees memory safety without needing a garbage collector.

title: Self-Sovereign Identity (SSI)
content: Self-Sovereign Identity (SSI) is a model for managing digital identities in which an individual has sole control over their personal data, without the need for a central administrative authority. It often uses Verifiable Credentials.
